resources.string: Happiness is a positive emotion filled with pleasure and joy. It makes you feel good.
The video shows what happy looks like. Look at
Jealousy is a negative emotion making you envy other people\'s achievements and advantages.
The video shows what jealousy looks like. Look at
You want what someone else has
Being angry is when you are feeling or showing great annoyance or displeasure
The video shows what anger looks like. Look at
Sadness is an emotional pain associated with, or characterized by, feelings of disadvantage, loss, despair, grief, helplessness, disappointment and sorrow.
The video shows what sadness looks like
When you are scared you feel like something bad is going to happen.
The video shows what being scared looks like
You may want to cover your eyes
Anxiety is an emotion that makes you feel very uneasy causing you to worry.
The video shows what being worried looks like
